verses.content: Sukkawinâwitu chu i hmai- hmaa chun a hung suok ie, kul- bîng chu enkawl la, lampui chu vêng rawh, i kâwng chu sukngar la, i thil- thawtheina chu hrâttakin siem ṭha rawh.
Israelhai ropuina angin Jakob- hai ropuina chu LALPA chun ân ngîr nâwk sih a; sukruoktuhaiin anni chu an sukruok zo tah a, an grêp kauhai an suksiet zo ta sih a.

A mi hrâthai phaw chu a sen a, mi huoisenhai chu a sen inlârin an inthuom a, an inbuotsaina nia chun tawlailîrhai chu kâpathîr tlêtin a tle zawr zawr a, feihai chu râpthlâktakin ân lap zawk zawk a nih.
Tawlailîrhai chu kawtthlêra chun an tlân bur bur a, lamlien lien- haia chun an insuk sawk sawk a, meiser angin an inlang a, kâwlinlep angin an tlân thuok thuok a nih.
A mi lienhai chu a hrietsuok a, an fe inruol chu an pêm a; kul bang tieng pan chun an inhmawh a, thil phên ding an siem a.
Vadung kawtkhârhai chu hawng a na, lal in chu sukramin a um a.
Chun, Huzzab chu an hlîp a, an fe hmangpui a, a suoknuhai chun an âwm inchumin vaṭhu inhrâm ang elin an ṭah a.
Tienlaia inthawk tah Ninevi khuo hi dîl ang a na; amiruokchu, an tlân hmang a, “Ngîr ro, ngir ro,” tiin an ko a, nisienlakhawm, tukhawm an ngha kîr nawh.
Tangkaruo râllâkhai chu lâkpêk unla, rângkachak râllâk sumhai chu lâkpêk ro; thil sêkkhâwl le thuom- hnaw ṭha po po ropuizie chun tâwpintai a nei si nawh.
Sukruokin a um a, a ruok dêr a, a rêm dêr a nih, lungril chu ân tui- hmang a, khûphai chu ân vuoktuoh a, kâwng po po chu a na ngawi ngawi a, an rênga hmêl chu a dâng zo vawng a nih.
Tukhawm isukṭit loa an umna, sakeibakneichal dâm, sakeibaknei- pui dâm, an fe vêlna sakeibaknei bu zâwl le sakeibakneitehaiin an fâkna hmun chu khâw lai am a na?
Sakeibakneichal chun a têhai khawp tâwk a keinâwi a, sakeibak- neipuihai ta dingin a se hlum a, a pûkhai chu a sasein a suksip a, a bu zâwlhai chu saruong kei nâwiin.

Sipaihai LALPA chun, “Ngai ta, ka do che a nih, i tawlailîrhai chu raw khu hlut hlut ka ta, i sakeibaknei têhai chu kâwlhnâmin bohmang an tih; chun, hnuoia i sase hi suktâwp ka ta, i palaihai râwl chu hriet ni ta naw ni,” a ta.
